description: An overview of the core stages and techniques involved in creating a professional music recording.

stages.name: Composition & Songwriting
stages.description: The initial creative process of writing the melody, harmony, rhythm, and lyrics for a piece of music.

stages.name: Arrangement
stages.description: The process of structuring the song, deciding which instruments will play which parts, and how the song will build and release tension.

stages.name: Recording (Tracking)
stages.description: The physical process of capturing audio. This involves setting up microphones, recording instruments and vocals, and capturing MIDI data from electronic instruments.

stages.name: Editing
stages.description: The process of cleaning up the recorded tracks. This includes comping (selecting the best parts of multiple takes), timing correction (quantization), and pitch correction (e.g., Auto-Tune).

stages.name: Mixing
stages.description: The art of blending all the individual tracks together into a cohesive whole. This involves adjusting levels (volume), panning (stereo placement), equalization (EQ), compression, reverb, and other effects to create space and clarity.

stages.name: Mastering
stages.description: The final step of post-production. The goal of mastering is to balance the sonic elements of a stereo mix and optimize playback across all systems and media formats. It ensures the song is commercially loud and polished.

daws.name: Ableton Live
daws.description: Popular for electronic music production and live performance due to its session view workflow.

daws.name: Logic Pro
daws.description: A Mac-only DAW known for its comprehensive set of included virtual instruments and plugins, popular for songwriting and production.

daws.name: FL Studio
daws.description: Known for its pattern-based sequencer, it is extremely popular in hip hop and EDM production.

daws.name: Pro Tools
daws.description: The long-time industry standard for professional recording studios, known for its audio editing and mixing capabilities.

ai_tools.name: Suno AI / Udio
ai_tools.description: Generative AI models that can create full songs, including vocals and instrumentation, from a simple text prompt.

ai_tools.name: AIVA
ai_tools.description: An AI composer that specializes in creating classical and cinematic music for soundtracks and other applications.

ai_tools.name: MuseNet (OpenAI)
ai_tools.description: A deep neural network that can generate 4-minute musical compositions with 10 different instruments, and can combine styles from country to Mozart to the Beatles.

ai_tools.name: Riffusion
ai_tools.description: An AI model that generates music from text prompts by creating and interpolating spectrograms (visual representations of audio).

ai_tools.name: Mixing/Mastering Plugins
ai_tools.description: AI-powered plugins like iZotope Ozone and Neutron that assist in the mixing and mastering process by suggesting EQ, compression, and loudness settings.
